Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • Car

  • public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a JavaDoc comment This is the Car class that is used to represent a car for CPSC231 The Car class is related to the person class. Explain what the Car class is: a class to create object representations of a 4-wheel vehicle This is the class for
    See Also:
    Person, Car

      A string storing the the model name of the Car
      private double m_mpg
      A double storing the miles per gallon for the Car
      private Person m_owner
      the owner of the vehicle, a Person object
      private int m_vin
      A int storing the vin number, guaranteed to be unique unless you create a deep or shallow copy of a Car It is calculated using the generateVin() @see generateVin()
      private int m_year
      An integer representing the year that the car was manufactured

      • Car

        public Car(int y,
           java.lang.String make,
           java.lang.String model,
           double mpg,
           Person owner)
        An Overload constructor
        Parameters:
        y - an integer to store the year of the car
        make - is a string to store the make of the car
        model - is a string to store the model of the car
        mpg - is a double to store mpg of your car
        owner - uses person to store the owner of the car.

      • generateVIN

      • calculateVIN

        private int calculateVIN()
        Calculates a unique identifier for each Car created guaranteed to be unique unless there are copies of a Car used in every constructor that is not a copy constructor
        Returns:
        a unique integer based on the number of cars created thus far in the application
